free.jin
Interface FriendsJinConnection

All Superinterfaces:
JinConnection
public interface FriendsJinConnection
extends JinConnection

An extension of the JinConnection interface which adds support for friend lists (notify lists on ICC).

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface free.jin.JinConnection
ABORTED, ADJOURNED, DRAWN, WHITE_LOST, WHITE_WON

Method Detail

getFriendsJinListenerManager

free.jin.event.FriendsJinListenerManager getFriendsJinListenerManager()
Returns the FriendsJinListenerManager which allows registering and unregistering FriendsListeners.

addFriend

void addFriend(java.lang.String name)
Adds the given player to the list of "friends".

removeFriend

void removeFriend(java.lang.String name)
Removes the given player from the list of "friends".

getFriends

java.lang.String[] getFriends()
Returns the current list of friends. Note that if you've recently called addFriend or removeFriend than the list may not be updated yet, because the actual list may be stored on the server, which hasn't had time to echo the change to us yet. To make sure you get the complete list, first register as a FriendsListener and then call this method.

isFriend

boolean isFriend(java.lang.String playerName)
Returns true if the given person is a friend. Returns false otherwise.

getOnlineFriends

java.lang.String[] getOnlineFriends()
Returns the current list of online friends. Note that if you've recently called addFriend or removeFriend, this list may not be updated yet, because the actual list may be stored on the server, which hasn't had time to echo the change to us yet. To make sure you get the complete list, first register as a FriendsListener and then call this method.

isFriendOnline

boolean isFriendOnline(java.lang.String playerName)
Returns true if the given person is a friend and is online. Note that if he's only been added recently, the server might not have had yet time to echo to use that he's online.
